properties.description: A bit array of `elements` to display, default is `<!enum>DatePicker::ELEMENT_YEAR_MONTH_DAY`.
properties.detail: Available elements can be found in `<!type>DatePicker::Element`.
properties.name: elements

properties.description: Whether to show a stepper in the text field, default is true.
properties.detail: Note that only certain platforms with certain elements can show stepper.
properties.name: has_stepper
